overview: Steel Injection: Running time 55 mins. Featuring only London Subway action mainly from the early 90s, but a few bits from the late 80s are featured as well. It includes writers such as: Rate, Teach, Fiza, Shuto, Fume, Sham 59, Siege, Diet, Hash, Irish, Neat, Funk, Soup, Honky and many more. Also includes brief footage of London's only T-2-B whole subway (No Amount Of Buff Can Cleanse Our Souls) by Cherish and Karl. The tape is interspersed with clips from TV news shows about London train writing. I can find nothing to fault this video on, apart from the god awful sound track! Watch this one with "mute" on!  https://www.graffiti.org/faq/videos.html
title: Steel Injection
